A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: By far not only one of the worst SW movies\, but a very mediocre sci-fi movie whatsoever. Inconsistent\, illogical\, with no credibility in creating any of its characters it seems chaotic and random not only as a part of the saga\, but also as a stand-alone movie. It is disrespectful to the die-hard fans as it contradicts everything we have been used to\, and for no reason\, as the plot is just shredded into random pieces. If 8 out of 10 main characters had been killed in the first 15 minutes\, nothing would have changed in the story; it gives something away\, doesn't it? Not the SW we used to know and just a bad movie.
